title: Govt.’s blind spot is microeconomics – Wimal Weerawansa
content: “However much we talk of economic growth, not enough money is going into the hands of the people. Decision making on development has become limited to just two or three people.” In 2005, Wimal Weerawansa’s platform oratory was one of the highlights of Mahinda Rajapaksa’s presidential election campaign.  In 2007, even as a JVP parliamentarian,…
